tool_description: Calculates property density metrics including floor area ratio, lot coverage, and dwelling units per acre to verify compliance with zoning density requirements.

property_area.description: Total property area in square feet

building_footprint.description: Building footprint area in square feet

total_floor_area.description: Total floor area all stories in square feet

dwelling_units.description: Number of dwelling units if residential

error_messages: Invalid area measurements: All area values must be positive numbers greater than zero.
Building area exceeds property: Building footprint cannot exceed property area.
Negative dwelling units: Number of dwelling units cannot be negative.
Invalid density limits: Maximum coverage, FAR, and density values must be positive.
usage: Input property areas, building measurements, and zoning limits to calculate density compliance. Essential for identifying overdevelopment violations.

units_per_acre.description: Dwelling units per acre if applicable
